long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click, select, screenshot ready.

Easy plugin for quick screenshots, click on the icon, select the screen area, release - the screenshot is ready!

It will immediately go to clipboard.
And so you can check the result, your screenshot will open in a new tab.
You can do it in 3 seconds!
